thought: I need to implement the Google Sheets read action with the specified documentId and sheetName from the user's input to read the commercial entries.
plan: Set documentId param with mode 'id' and the provided document ID.
Set sheetName param with mode 'id' and the provided sheet name 'commercial'.
Set filtersUI and options as empty since no filters or options are specified.
Test reading the sheet data to verify the output contains the commercial entries.
criticism: Currently, the read action has empty params, so it cannot read any data. Setting correct params is necessary to get the data for the workflow.

tool_input.comments: Read all rows from the specified Google Sheet document and sheetName 'commercial'.
